Extremely Satified with the product
review:
I bought this mobile back in November 2016 after lot of market research. I
gave it 3 star due to some drawback.  
  
The positive side of Lg stylus 2:  
1\. Awesome look. I just fall in love by its look. Its slim & stylish. It
would add a classy effect in your hand.  
  
2\. Camera quality is brilliant. It would give a good competition to iphone
5s.  
  
3\. Easy to use. Not that complicated as Xperia.  
  
4\. Battery back is too good. The phone would not switch off even in 4%
charge.  
  
5\. The speaker sound quality is good.  
Headphone is nice as well.  
  
6\. 5"7 inch screen would made ur experience of watching videos positive.  
  
Now the negative side.  
  
1\. Do not have call recording facility.  
2\. You cannot screenshot.  
3\. It some time becomes too heat but cools down fast as well. But it might be
a probldm for the heavy users.  
4\. After using 3 month it sometimes getting hang.  
  
Overall I'm loving this phone but it did not reach up to my expectation. But
in this price range it is worth buying.  
  
Regards  
Jayesmita

What to say! Phone is stylish. Camera is average, mainly because the picture
quality does not reflect the megapixels. The stand by mode is devil in
disguise, as it requires me to perform a hard restart by pulling out the
battery every morning. Android Marshmellow does not seem to be a good OS for
this model. I am looking forward to downgrading to upgrading it to see if that
makes any difference. Android phones are like so open and so full of features,
that it looks messy to me.  
The flip cover makes it look stylish with the side view options, else I
expected a lot from the this phone considering this being a good config phone.

Helo all..i m hardcore fan of Lg mobiles due to the basic features of their
mobiles and wonderful UI..I bought this mobile 3 weeks back for my wife..this
mobile is good for its size,light weight,awsom sound clarity,superb battery
life, user interface..the only cone i had faced is the screen resolution..its
very bad..although its and HD screen,i can feel pixelation on the
screen..fotos seems to pixelate...my final verdict is to go for this mobile if
ur requirement is only a basic camera and an awsom mobile..pls.go for it..i
would stil recommend this fon to people..because this is such a practical
mobile which every body wil love to have..thank u all..LIFE IS
GOOD...laaaalalllllaaaallaaaa..

Decent phone for it's price. Got 6 months screen warranty. Hangs sometimes but
not too often. Battery lasts for 2 days. Got wet and displays stopped working.
LG replaced the screen in 1 hour. I bought it after hearing good reviews of LG
Service. I got what I paid for.
